Aroz Caldo

Arroz Caldo is a hearty Filipino rice porridge dish that is typically made with chicken, rice, ginger, garlic, and onion, and
flavored with fish sauce or salt. It is often garnished with crispy fried garlic, green onions, and a squeeze of calamansi juice.
Arroz Caldo is a comfort food that is commonly served as breakfast or merienda (snack) and is also known for its warming and soothing properties, making it a popular dish during cold and rainy weather or when someone is feeling under the weather.

Ingredients

    Set A
  • - 4 Cloves Garlic (minced)
  • - 1 Piece Red Onion (minced)
  • - 1/2 Cup Ordinary Rice
  • - 1/2 Cup Malagkit Rice
  • - 1 Teaspoon Kasubha
  • - 5 Cups Chicken Stock
  • - 1/2 Piece Chicken
  • - Salt and Pepper

    • Set B
  • - 2 Tablespoons Ginger (minced)
  • - 1 Cup Water
  • - 4 Tablespoons Fish Sauce

    • Set C
  • - 4 Cloves Garlic (Fried, minced)
  • - 1 Boiled Egg
  • - Chopped Spring Onion
